channel.title: RiGiDscape 718! ALL BOSSES! 5 PRESTIGES! GREAT STAFF! MANY RARES!
channel.description:
Forums: http://rigidscape.proboards.com/
Download Link is in forums also! but I will post here too! Strongly prefer for you to join forums today!
Webclient: http://rigidscape.comxa.com/webclient.html
Download: http://uppit.com/c2dgr5shvs25/RiGiDscape2.jar
Server Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D3CyuaiUIM8&feature=youtu.be
[size=18pt][b]Hello everybody! We have officially finished our week of beta testing and are ready to have the server up to the public! Below I will post what all the server has![/b][/size] [size=14pt]We have a numerous amount of items in the server... From working Christmas Working Auras to Flaming Skulls! We have Torva, Virtus, and Pernix! All PK armour such as Statius, Morrigan's and Vestas! Working Dice! All Chaotics with Dungeoneering! And ALOT more!![/size]
The server has a completionist cape! 5 Prestiges! Working Kiln All bosses that we have that work 100% include -Nex -Bandos -Armadyl -Tormented Demons (Claw Drop) -Revenants (PVP Armour) -Glacors -Barrows -Mithril Dragons -Corporal Beast -Dagannoth's -Zamorak -Saradomin -Sea Troll Queen -Kalphite Queen -Queen Black Dragon with working stages!
EVERY skill works in the server! This includes dungeoneering, and construction! Not many servers have it where you can build onto your own house..
We have our own in game trivia game where you can answer uestions at any time when they pop up and whoever answers first wins a point! You can use these points to buy items in game!
We have our own donator shops that you can get donator points for now! We are currently however working on a huge donator update to where there are 10x more options and even items that are never seen in other servers!
If this has interested you any then join now!
Hope you enjoy! Server is going to be worked on just about everyday with frequent updates! We have amazing staff! All of which are graduated besides one player! We know how to have fun!
:D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D :D

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/201/fusw.png/][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/8454/fusw.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/11/v08p.png/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/1175/v08p.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/34/ane6.png/][IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/1711/ane6.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/30/b0pw.png/][IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/4043/b0pw.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/69/30eo.png/][IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/1051/30eo.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: RiGiDscape 718! ALL BOSSES! 5 PRESTIGES! GREAT STAFF! MANY RARES!
item.dc:creator: @sandeent95 sandeent95
item.description:
@sandeent95 wrote:

Forums: http://rigidscape.proboards.com/

Download Link is in forums also! but I will post here too! Strongly prefer for you to join forums today!

Webclient: http://rigidscape.comxa.com/webclient.html

Download: http://uppit.com/c2dgr5shvs25/RiGiDscape2.jar

Server Video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D3CyuaiUIM8&feature=youtu.be

[size=18pt]Hello everybody! We have officially finished our week of beta testing and are ready to have the server up to the public! Below I will post what all the server has![/size]
[size=14pt]We have a numerous amount of items in the server… From working Christmas Working Auras to Flaming Skulls!
We have Torva, Virtus, and Pernix!
All PK armour such as Statius, Morrigan’s and Vestas!
Working Dice!
All Chaotics with Dungeoneering!
And ALOT more!![/size]

The server has a completionist cape!
5 Prestiges!
Working Kiln
All bosses that we have that work 100% include
-Nex
-Bandos
-Armadyl
-Tormented Demons (Claw Drop)
-Revenants (PVP Armour)
-Glacors
-Barrows
-Mithril Dragons
-Corporal Beast
-Dagannoth’s
-Zamorak
-Saradomin
-Sea Troll Queen
-Kalphite Queen
-Queen Black Dragon with working stages!

EVERY skill works in the server! This includes dungeoneering, and construction! Not many servers have it where you can build onto your own house…

We have our own in game trivia game where you can answer uestions at any time when they pop up and whoever answers first wins a point! You can use these points to buy items in game!

We have our own donator shops that you can get donator points for now! We are currently however working on a huge donator update to where there are 10x more options and even items that are never seen in other servers!

If this has interested you any then join now!

Hope you enjoy! Server is going to be worked on just about everyday with frequent updates!
We have amazing staff! All of which are graduated besides one player! We know how to have fun!
